law.catch_line: A person shall repeat the notification required under § 12-124 of this subtitle if the person:...

text.section:
A person shall repeat the notification required under § 12-124 of this subtitle if the person:
has not completed or will not complete the excavation or demolition within the time period authorized by the ticket; or
intends to expand the excavation or demolition beyond the location indicated in the notice under § 12-124(b) of this subtitle.

A person shall repeat the notification regardless of:
any delays by an owner-member in marking its underground facilities; or
an agreement between the person and an owner-member regarding the time for marking underground facilities.
